name: i18next-translate
description: Automated i18next hardcoded string detection and translation workflow with self-verification. Finds hardcoded strings in your codebase, fixes them using i18next patterns, and verifies progress iteratively.

steps: Run i18next-cli lint to find hardcoded strings
Fix identified hardcoded strings by replacing with i18next translation calls
Verify fixes by running lint again
Iterate until no more hardcoded strings are found
